overview: Trisha finds yards on yards of rope in her moms pantie drawer. She shows it to Chloe, who is also very intrigued by it. She suggests that maybe Trishas parents are into kink, and she might be right. Anthony and Bruno have been getting letters that they were about to get evicted because their roommate Sydney has failed to pay rent for months. They called her up and told her that she had a package waiting for her to get her to come home. Adria and hey boyfriend make a beautiful breakfast for her stepmom. After they drop off her breakfast in bed, Adria runs outside to talk with her dad real quick, leaving her bf all alone with Danica. The breakfast was great, but she would love a back rub too. And so on
title: Our Threesome Fantasy
